verses.plain: How long wilt thou forget me, O LORD? for ever? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me?

tokens.t: How long wilt thou forget me, O
? for ever? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me?

verses.plain: How long shall I take counsel in my soul, having sorrow in my heart daily? how long shall mine enemy be exalted over me?

tokens.t: How long shall I take counsel in my soul,
sorrow in my heart daily? how long shall mine enemy be exalted over me?

verses.plain: Consider and hear me, O LORD my God: lighten mine eyes, lest I sleep the sleep of death;

tokens.t: my God: lighten mine eyes, lest I sleep the

verses.plain: Lest mine enemy say, I have prevailed against him; and those that trouble me rejoice when I am moved.

tokens.t: Lest mine enemy say, I have prevailed against him;
those that trouble me rejoice when I am moved.

verses.plain: But I have trusted in thy mercy; my heart shall rejoice in thy salvation.

tokens.t: But I have trusted in thy mercy; my heart shall rejoice in thy salvation.

verses.plain: I will sing unto the LORD, because he hath dealt bountifully with me.

tokens.t: , because he hath dealt bountifully with me.
